LABEL: 0x31D
STRING: And then, the past is shut off.

LABEL: 0x39B
STRING: I look directly at "her" as she makes her declaration.

LABEL: 0x3F1
STRING: One of them is right in front of me.

LABEL: 0x566
STRING: The woman wearing a white coat nods.

LABEL: 0x5B2
STRING: I couldn't see "her" face before, which was hazy until a few moments ago.

LABEL: 0x606
STRING: But now, I can see it as if a fog had cleared.

LABEL: 0x65A
STRING: "She" is, without a doubt, Momoi Yukari.

LABEL: 0x685
STRING: The moment I recognize her, I'm assaulted by a sense of nostalgia that makes my chest tighten.

LABEL: 0x6D1
STRING: 「This time... you were the only one who survived.」

LABEL: 0x729
STRING: My chest hurts... I feel like there's a name for this emotion.

LABEL: 0x7AF
STRING: She speaks again in a quiet voice as if suppressing her emotions.

LABEL: 0x87C
STRING: I search for the right words in the silence.

LABEL: 0x8CE
STRING: 「Why... Why couldn't she return to the surface?」

LABEL: 0x918
STRING: The voices of the girls who had been lost asked a question.

LABEL: 0x96A
STRING: 「Do you think a choice made with good intentions always yields good results?」

LABEL: 0x9CA
STRING: This admonishing tone matches "her" from my memories.

LABEL: 0xA16
STRING: 「Regardless of your intentions, the results are as you see.」

LABEL: 0xAAA
STRING: Accepting that fact, a thought suddenly occurs to me.

LABEL: 0xADA
STRING: I see... This emotion is called regret.

LABEL: 0xB06
STRING: 「...There must've been a possibility for a different outcome.」

LABEL: 0xB38
STRING: So, I have to resist as best I can.

LABEL: 0xBAA
STRING: There had been a glimpse of a possibility, an opportunity to make a choice.

LABEL: 0xBFC
STRING: 「――How could I have avoided the worst-case scenario?!」

LABEL: 0xC42
STRING: My strong feelings well up to the point of overflowing.

LABEL: 0xD0D
STRING: 「Katagiri-san, what is it that you want to know?」

LABEL: 0xD5D
STRING: Her soft voice calms my seething emotions.

LABEL: 0xD9D
STRING: But, even if I've calmed down, my feelings themselves haven't changed.

LABEL: 0xDE4
STRING: I recite the same answer as before.

LABEL: 0xE0A
STRING: 「How could we have avoided the worst outcome...?」

LABEL: 0xF63
STRING: There's only one thing to do.

LABEL: 0x1052
STRING: 「To the very beginning. To that sea.」

LABEL: 0x10DA
STRING: 「You don't want to accept it either, do you?」

LABEL: 0x113C
STRING: ..."You two really are siblings, aren't you?" I hear her sad whisper.

LABEL: 0x117E
STRING: 「I understand. Let's try one more time.」

LABEL: 0x11B8
STRING: Her small hand touches the black cube.

LABEL: 0x1240
STRING: I will return to "his" point of view.

LABEL: 0x126E
STRING: I try to keep myself on this side of the world.

LABEL: 0x12B6
STRING: I hear a voice calling out to me.

LABEL: 0x1394
STRING: As if to shake off that somewhat nostalgic echo, I submerge my consciousness into the noise.

LABEL: 0x1426
STRING: ――This time, I have to save everyone.

LABEL: 0x1494
STRING: Back to Kurama Bay on August 1st, 2033.

LABEL: 0x14C8
STRING: The noise covers the white room once more.
